Title: The Lord's Force
Writer: Blake Anderson, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam Devine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Bill Krebs (staff writer)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Scott Connors
Plot: The guys welcome two members of their favorite faith-based strong man group into their home.
